titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 150th anniversary of Alcorn State University, the oldest public historically Black land-grant university in the United States.
A resolution recognizing the 150th anniversary of Alcorn State University, the oldest public historically Black land-grant university in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 150th anniversary of Alcorn State University, which is the oldest public historically Black land-grant institution in the United States.
